mapper.insert: insert into administrators (admin_id, admin_id_number, admin_account_number, admin_password, admin_sexual, admin_age, admin_power_user, admin_power_computer, admin_power_superme, admin_state) values (#{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adminIdNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminAccountNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminSexual,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adminPowerUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adminPowerComputer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adminPowerSuperme,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adminState,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update administrators set admin_id_number = #{adminIdNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_account_number = #{adminAccountNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_password = #{adminPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_sexual = #{adminSexual,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_age = #{adminAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, admin_power_user = #{adminPowerUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, admin_power_computer = #{adminPowerComputer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, admin_power_superme = #{adminPowerSuperme,jdbcType=INTEGER}, admin_state = #{adminState,jdbcType=INTEGER} where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select admin_id, admin_id_number, admin_account_number, admin_password, admin_sexual, admin_age, admin_power_user, admin_power_computer, admin_power_superme, admin_state from administrators where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
